sense: The sixth day of the week in many religious traditions, and the fifth day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm; the Muslim Sabbath; it follows Thursday and precedes Saturday.
The second day of the week in many religious traditions, and the first day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm. It follows Sunday and precedes Tuesday.
The seventh day of the week in many religious traditions, and the sixth day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm; the Jewish Sabbath; it follows Friday and precedes Sunday.

The first day of the week in many religious traditions, and the seventh day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 standard; the Christian Sabbath; the Lord's Day; it follows Saturday and precedes Monday.
The fifth day of the week in many religious traditions, and the fourth day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm; it follows Wednesday and precedes Friday.
The third day of the week in many religious traditions, and the second day of the week in systems that use the ISO 8601 norm; it follows Monday and precedes Wednesday.
The fourth day of the week in many religious traditions, and the third day of the week in systems using the ISO 8601 norm; it follows Tuesday and precedes Thursday.
On all sides; around.
Directly overhead; vertically on top of.
The effort of performing or doing something.
The state or quality of being active; activeness.
Someone who institutes a legal suit; a plaintiff or complainant.
A female who performs on the stage or in films.
To join or unite (e.g. one thing to another, or as several particulars) so as to increase the number, augment the quantity, or enlarge the magnitude, or so as to form into one aggregate.
Direction.
A fully grown human or other animal.
An opinion offered to guide behavior in an effort to be helpful.
Impressed with fear or apprehension; in fear.
The part of the day from noon or lunchtime until sunset, evening, or suppertime or 6pm.
Another time: indicating a repeat of an action.

The amount of time that some being has been alive, or that some thing has been in existence, as measured from its birth or origin until the present or until some other given reference point. (Often measured in number of years; alternatively in months, days, hours, etc.; see also the usage notes)
To be in harmony about an opinion, statement, or action; to have a consistent idea between two or more people.
The substance constituting Earth's atmosphere: a gaseous mixture of nitrogen, oxygen, and various trace gases.
An airfield (an area designated for the takeoff and landing of aircraft), including one or more runways and (for commercial airports) one or more passenger terminals.
In addition; besides; as well; further; too.
At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
Causing wonder and amazement; very surprising.
Displaying or feeling anger.

Any eukaryote of the clade Animalia; a multicellular organism that is usually mobile, whose cells are not encased in a rigid cell wall (distinguishing it from plants and fungi) and which derives energy solely from the consumption of other organisms (distinguishing it from plants).
A response or reply; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question.
To make a reply or response to.
A complete domicile occupying only part of a building, especially one for rent; a flat.
A common, firm, round fruit produced by a tree of the genus Malus.
A measure of the extent of a surface; it is measured in square units.
A weapon.
The portion of the upper human appendage, from the shoulder to the wrist and sometimes including the hand.
So as to form a circle or trace a circular path, or approximation thereof.
To reach; to get to a certain place.

The conscious production or arrangement of sounds, colours, forms, movements, or other elements in a manner that affects the senses and emotions, usually specifically the production of the beautiful in a graphic or plastic medium.
A piece of nonfiction writing such as a story, report, opinion piece, or entry in a newspaper, magazine, journal, encyclopedia, etc.
A person who creates art.
To request or petition.
The sister or sister-in-law of one’s parent.
From a place, hence.
Causing awe or terror; inspiring wonder or excitement.
A very young human, particularly from birth to a couple of years old or until walking is fully mastered.
To or in a previous condition or place.
A large shallow vat; a cistern, tub, or trough, used by brewers, distillers, dyers, picklers, gluemakers, and others, for mixing or cooling wort, holding water, hot glue, etc.
The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
Bold, daring, and tough.
A soft container made out of cloth, paper, thin plastic, etc. and open at the top, used to hold food, commodities, and other goods.
A formal dance.
A solid or hollow sphere, or roughly spherical mass.
An elongated curved tropical fruit of a banana plant, which grows in bunches and has a creamy flesh and a smooth skin.
A row or panel of items stored or grouped together.
An edge of river, lake, or other watercourse.
An institution where one can place and borrow money and take care of financial affairs.
A non-SI unit of pressure equal to 100,000 pascals, approximately equal to atmospheric pressure at sea level.
A solid, more or less rigid object of metal or wood with a uniform cross-section smaller than its length.

A sport common in North America, the Caribbean, and East Asia, in which the object is to strike a ball so that one of a nine-person team can run counter-clockwise among four bases, resulting in the scoring of a run. The team with the most runs after termination of play, usually nine innings, wins.
A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to put a ball through a hoop.
A former Hebrew unit of liquid volume (about 23 L or 6 gallons).
A tub or pool which is used for bathing: bathtub.
A room containing a shower and/or bathtub, and (typically but not necessarily) a toilet.
The shore of a body of water, especially when sandy or pebbly.
Possessing beauty, impressing the eye; attractive.
begin to be; turn into.
A piece of furniture, usually flat and soft, on which to rest or sleep.
A room in a house, apartment, hotel, or other dwelling where a bed is kept for sleeping.
An alcoholic drink fermented from starch material, commonly barley malt; often with hops or some other substance (like gruit) to impart a bitter flavor.
To start, to initiate or take the first step into something.

The act of doing that which begins anything; commencement of an action, state, or space of time; entrance into being or upon a course; the first act, effort, or state of a succession of acts or states.
At or in the rear or back part of something.
To accept as true, particularly without absolute certainty (i.e., as opposed to knowing).
In or to a lower place.
superlative form of good: most good.
comparative form of good: more good
A vehicle that has two primary wheels, one behind the other, a steering handle, and a saddle seat or seats and is usually propelled by the action of a rider’s feet upon pedals.
Of great size, large.
Clipping of bicycle.
A written list or inventory. (Now obsolete except in specific senses or set phrases; bill of lading, bill of goods, etc.)

Any of various bladed or pointed hand weapons, originally designating an Anglo-Saxon sword, and later a weapon of infantry, especially in the 14th and 15th centuries, commonly consisting of a broad, heavy, double-edged, hook-shaped blade, with a short pike at the back and another at the top, attached to the end of a long staff.
The beak of a bird, especially when small or flattish; sometimes also used with reference to a platypus, turtle, or other animal.

An animal of the clade (traditionally class) Aves in the phylum Chordata, characterized by being warm-blooded, having feathers and wings usually capable of flight, having a beaked mouth, and laying eggs.
The anniversary of the day on which someone is born.
Absorbing all light and reflecting none; dark and hueless.
The colour/color perceived in the absence of light, but also when no light is reflected, but rather absorbed.

A website that allows users to reflect, share opinions, and discuss various topics in the form of an online journal, sometimes letting readers comment on their posts. Most blogs are written in a slightly informal tone (personal journals, news, businesses, etc.)
Of a bleached or pale golden (light yellowish) colour.
Of a blue hue.
The colour of the clear sky or the deep sea; the colour midway between green and violet in the visible spectrum and one of the primary additive colours.
A craft used for transportation of goods, fishing, racing, recreational cruising, or military use on or in the water, propelled by oars or outboard motor or inboard motor or by wind.
Physical frame.
A collection of sheets of paper bound together to hinge at one edge, containing printed or written material, pictures, etc.
A bootleg recording.
A heavy shoe that covers part of the leg.
Remedy, amends.
The act or process of bootstrapping; the starting or re-starting of a computing device.
Suffering from boredom; mildly annoyed and restless through having nothing to do.
Causing boredom or tiredness; making one feel tired and impatient.
A container, typically made of glass or plastic and having a tapered neck, used primarily for holding liquids.
A blow with the fist.
Any of various evergreen shrubs or trees of genus Buxus, especially common box, European box, or boxwood (Buxus sempervirens) which is often used for making hedges and topiary.
Senses relating to a three-dimensional object or space.
A human male child.
A male partner in an unmarried romantic relationship.
A foodstuff made by baking dough made from cereals.
An instance of breaking something into two or more pieces.
To separate into two or more pieces, to fracture or crack, by a process that cannot easily be reversed for reassembly.
The first meal of the day, usually eaten in the morning.
To transport toward somebody/somewhere.
Son of the same parents as another person.
Having a brown colour.
A colour like that of chocolate or coffee.
To form (something) by combining materials or parts.
The act or process by which something is built; construction.
A motor vehicle for transporting large numbers of people along roads.
A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
Crowded with business or activities; having a great deal going on.
A soft, fatty foodstuff made by churning the cream of milk (generally cow's milk).
To obtain (something) in exchange for money or goods.
A rich, sweet dessert food, typically made of flour, sugar, and eggs and baked in an oven, and often covered in icing.
A cry or shout.
To reach out with one's voice.
Example: He used his camera to click photos of the bears in the zoo.
To know how to.
To seal in a can.
Can not (be unable to).
Already-produced durable goods available for use as a factor of production, such as steam shovels (equipment) and office buildings (structures).
The uppermost part of a column.
A wheeled vehicle that moves independently, with at least three wheels, powered mechanically, steered by a driver and mostly for personal transportation.
A playing card.
Material with embedded short wire bristles.
One’s calling in life; one's working occupation or profession, especially when pursued seriously and/or over a long period of time.
A vegetable with a nutritious, juicy, sweet root that is often orange in colour, Daucus carota, family Apiaceae, especially the subspecies sativus.
To lift (something) and take it to another place; to transport (something) by lifting.
An animal of the family Felidae:
A subunit of currency equal to one-hundredth of the main unit of currency in many countries. Symbol: ¢.
The point in the interior of a circle that is equidistant from all points on the circumference.
An item of furniture used to sit on or in, comprising a seat, legs or wheels, back, and sometimes arm rests, for use by one person.
The process of becoming different.
To become something different.
A map.
Low or reduced in price.
To inspect; to examine.
A dairy product made from curdled or cultured milk.
A domesticated subspecies of red junglefowl (Gallus gallus domesticus), especially so-called when young.
A person who has not yet reached adulthood, whether natural (puberty), cultural (initiation), or legal (majority).
A food made from ground roasted cocoa beans.
To pick; to make the choice of; to select.
A large settlement, bigger than a town; sometimes with a specific legal definition, depending on the place.
A group, collection, category or set sharing characteristics or attributes.
A room, often in a school, where classes take place.
Free of dirt, filth, or impurities (extraneous matter); not dirty, filthy, or soiled.
To remove dirt from a place or object.
To ascend; rise; to go up.
A chronometer, an instrument that measures time, particularly the time of day.
A pattern near the heel of a sock or stocking.
To remove or block an opening, gap or passage through.
Items of clothing; apparel.
An association of members joining together for some common purpose, especially sports or recreation.
An outer garment covering the upper torso and arms.
A beverage made by infusing the beans of the coffee plant in hot water.
Having a low temperature.
A condition of low temperature.
An academic institution.
The spectral composition of visible light.
To move nearer to the point of perspective.
Mutual; shared by more than one.
A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
To assess the similarities and differences between two or more things ["to compare X with Y"]. Having made the comparison of X with Y, one might have found it similar to Y or different from Y.
With all parts included; with nothing missing; full.
To finish; to make done; to reach the end.
A person employed to perform computations; one who computes.
An agreement in a design or plan; a union formed by mutual communication of opinions and views; an accordance in a scheme; harmony; a simultaneous action.
Expression and exchange of individual ideas through talking with other people; also, a set instance or occasion of such talking.
To prepare food for eating by heating it, often combining with other ingredients.
The process of preparing food by using heat.
Of a mildly low temperature.
Free from error; true; accurate.
To make something that was wrong become right; to remove error from.
Amount of money, time, etc. that is required or used.
To incur a charge of; to require payment of a (specified) price.
The territory of a nation; a sovereign state or a region once independent and still distinct in institutions, language, etc.
A sequence of events.
Chiefly with a qualifying word: Any relation (especially a distant one) who is not a direct ancestor or descendant but part of a person's extended family; a kinsman or kinswoman.
An adult female of the species Bos taurus, especially one that has calved.
The butterfat or milkfat part of milk which rises to the top; this part when separated from the remainder.
To bring into existence; (sometimes in particular:)
The arts, customs, lifestyles, background, and habits that characterize humankind, or a particular society or nation.
A concave vessel for drinking, usually made of opaque material (as opposed to a glass) and with a handle.
A habitual patron, regular purchaser, returning client; a person or company who has a custom of buying from a particular business.
To incise, to cut into the surface of something.
A father, a male parent.
A sequence of rhythmic steps or movements usually performed to music, for pleasure or as a form of social interaction.
To move with rhythmic steps or movements, especially in time to music.

The activity of taking part in a dance.
Full of danger.
Having an absolute or (more often) relative lack of light.
The addition to a writing, inscription, coin, etc., which specifies the time (especially the day, month, and year) when the writing or inscription was given, executed, or made.
The fruit of the date palm, Phoenix dactylifera, somewhat in the shape of an olive, containing a soft, sweet pulp and enclosing a hard kernel.
One’s female offspring.
The time when the Sun is above the horizon and it lights the sky.
High in price; expensive.
To resolve (a contest, problem, dispute, etc.); to choose, determine, or settle.
Pleasing to the sense of taste; tasty.
To represent in words.
A sketch or account of anything in words; a portraiture or representation in language; an enumeration of the essential qualities of a thing or species.
A specification of an object or process, referring to requirements to be satisfied and thus conditions to be met for them to solve a problem.
To plan and carry out (a picture, work of art, construction etc.).
A table, frame, or case, in past centuries usually with a sloping top but now usually with a flat top, for the use of writers and readers. It often has a drawer or repository underneath.
A part small enough to escape casual notice.
A conversation or other form of discourse between two or more individuals.

A reference work listing words or names from one or more languages, usually ordered alphabetically, explaining each word's meanings or senses, oftentimes also containing information on its etymology, pronunciation, usage, semantic relations, translations, as well as other relevant information.
To stop living; to become dead; to undergo death.
A council or assembly of leaders; a formal deliberative assembly.
The food and beverage a person or animal consumes.
The quality of being different.
Not the same; exhibiting a difference.
Hard, not easy, requiring much effort.
The main meal of the day, often eaten in the evening.
Unclean; covered with or containing unpleasant substances such as dirt or grime.
To converse or debate concerning a particular topic.
A vessel such as a plate for holding or serving food, often flat with a depressed region in the middle.
A syntactic marker.

A physician; a member of the medical profession; one who is trained and licensed to heal the sick or injured. The final examination and qualification may award a doctor degree in which case the post-nominal letters are D.O., DPM, M.D., DMD, DDS, in the US or MBBS in the UK.
A mammal of the family Canidae:
Official designation for currency in some parts of the world, including Canada, the United States, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Hong Kong, and elsewhere. Its symbol is $.

A portal of entry into a building, room, or vehicle, typically consisting of a rigid plane movable on a hinge. It may have a handle to help open and close, a latch to hold it closed, and a lock that ensures it cannot be opened without a key.
From a higher position to a lower one; downwards.
Down the stairs.
Senses relating to exerting force or pulling.
An item of clothing (usually worn by a woman or young girl) which both covers the upper part of the body and includes a skirt below the waist.
To put clothes (or, formerly, armour) on (oneself or someone, a doll, a mannequin, etc.); to clothe.
A beverage.

For one; apiece; per.
The fruiting body of a grain plant.
The organ of hearing, consisting of the pinna or auricle, auditory canal, eardrum, malleus, incus, stapes and cochlea.
At a time in advance of the usual or expected event.
At a time before expected; sooner than usual.
Situated or lying in or towards the east; eastward.
towards the east; eastwards
The direction of the earth's rotation, specifically 90°.
Comfortable; at ease.
To ingest; to be ingested.
An approximately spherical or ellipsoidal body produced by birds, insects, reptiles, and other animals, housing the embryo within a membrane or shell during its development.
A mammal of the family Elephantidae in the order Proboscidea, having a trunk, and two large ivory tusks jutting from the upper jaw.
Otherwise, if not.
A system for sending messages and datas by means of computers connected together in a network.
To send an email or emails to.
The terminal point of something in space or time.
To come to an end.
To receive pleasure or satisfaction from something.
Sufficiently.
Macropus robustus, a wallaroo (macropod species).
The currency unit of the European Monetary Union. Symbol: €
Exactly, just, fully.
The time of day between afternoon and night.
An occurrence; something that happens.
Always, frequently, forever.
Something that is representative of all such things in a group.
Having great enthusiasm, passion and energy.
creating or producing excitement
Any activity designed to develop or hone a skill or ability.

Having a high price or cost.

Beyond what is due, usual, expected, or necessary; extraneous; additional; supernumerary.
An organ through which animals see (“perceive surroundings via light”).
The front part of the head of a human or other animal, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth, and the surrounding area.
Something actual as opposed to invented.
The act of moving to a lower position under the effect of gravity.
To be moved downwards.
Untrue, not factual, factually incorrect.
Suitable for children and adults.
A group of people who are closely related to one another (by blood, marriage or adoption); kin; in particular, a set of parents and their children; an immediate family.

Someone or something that farms, as:

Carrying more fat than usual on one's body; plump; not lean or thin.

Sensation, particularly through the skin.
A feast or feast day.

Last; ultimate.

Before anything else; firstly.
A cold-blooded vertebrate animal that lives in water, moving with the help of fins and breathing with gills.
The act of fleeing.
The act of flying.
The interior bottom or surface of a house or building; the supporting surface of a room.
A colorful, conspicuous structure associated with angiosperms, frequently scented and attracting various insects, and which may or may not be used for sexual reproduction.
To hit a fly ball; to hit a fly ball that is caught for an out. Compare ground (verb) and line (verb).
To travel through the air, another gas, or a vacuum, without being in contact with a grounded surface.
To go after; to pursue; to move behind in the same path or direction, especially with the intent of catching.
Any solid substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
A biological structure found in many animals that is used for locomotion and that is frequently a separate organ at the terminal part of the leg.
A sport played on foot in which teams attempt to get a ball into a goal or zone defended by the other team.

Unconstrained.
A person, typically someone other than a family member, spouse or lover, whose company one enjoys and towards whom one feels affection.

An utterance of goodbye, the wishing of farewell to someone.

Of a colour between black and white.

In the International System of Units, the derived unit of absorbed dose of radiation (radiation absorbed by a patient); one joule of energy absorbed per kilogram of the patient's mass. Symbol: Gy

Designating the side of the body toward the west when one is facing north; the side of the body on which the heart is located in most humans; the opposite of right. This arrow points to the reader's left: ←

A path through two or more points (compare ‘segment’); a continuous mark, including as made by a pen; any path, curved or straight.

A big cat, Panthera leo, native to Africa, India and formerly much of Europe.
A strip of fabric, especially from the edge of a piece of cloth.
A tilt to a building.
To cause (something) to tilt to one side.
To create or recite a list.
To desire, like, or wish (to do something).
To listen.
To use one's sense of hearing in an intentional way; to make deliberate use of one's ears; to pay attention to or wait for a specific sound.
Small in size.
To be alive; to have life.
From or in a nearby location.
Having much distance in space from one end to the other.
Over a great distance in space.
To try to see, to pay attention to with one’s eyes.
To cause (something) to cease to be in one's possession or capability.
A deep caring for the existence of another.
Zero, no score.
To have a strong affection for (someone or something).
A light meal usually eaten around midday, notably when not as main meal of the day.
A device that directs and controls energy, often in the form of movement or electricity, to produce a certain effect.
A nonacademic, periodical publication which consists of articles by multiple writers on some broad topic or theme.
Of chief or leading importance; prime, principal.
To create.
A pedestrianised street, especially a shopping precinct.
An adult male human.
A visual representation of an area, whether real or imaginary, showing the relative positions of places and other features.
A gathering of people for the purchase and sale of merchandise, often periodic at a set time.
In a state of marriage; having a wife or a husband.
A competitive sporting event such as a boxing meet (commonly called a "bout"), a baseball game, or a cricket match.
A device made of wood or paper, having the tip coated with chemicals that ignite with the friction of being dragged (struck) against a rough dry surface.
To agree; to be equal; to correspond.
Perhaps, possibly.
Food that is prepared and eaten, usually at a specific time, and usually in a comparatively large quantity (as opposed to a snack).
The ground-up edible part of various grains, used as a basis of food or feed; either flour or a coarser blend than flour (usage varies).
To intend.
The denotation, referent, or idea connected with a word, expression, or symbol.
The flesh (muscle tissue) of an animal used as food.
To make contact (with someone) while in proximity.
The act of persons or things that meet.
One who belongs to a group.
The details of the food to be served at a banquet; a bill of fare.
A communication, or what is communicated; any concept or information conveyed.
A device that measures things.
The middle of the night: the sixth temporal hour, equidistant between sunset and sunrise.
The international mile: a unit of length precisely equal to 1.609344 kilometers established by treaty among Anglophone nations in 1959, divided into 5,280 feet or 1,760 yards.

A white liquid produced by the mammary glands of female mammals to nourish their young. From certain animals, especially cows, it is also called dairy milk and is a common food for humans as a beverage or used to produce various dairy products such as butter, cheese, and yogurt.
A unit of time which is one sixtieth of an hour (sixty seconds).
To fail to hit, catch, grasp, etc.
An error.
A person who serves as a human template for artwork or fashion.
Pertaining to a current or recent time and style; not ancient.
A particular point, or relatively small region.
A legally or socially binding conceptual contract of entitlement to wealth, void of intrinsic value, payable for all debts and taxes, and regulated in supply.
A period into which a year is divided, historically based on the phases of the moon.
The early part of the day, especially from midnight to noon.
A female parent, especially of a human; a female who parents a child (which she has given birth to, adopted, or fostered).
An elevation of land of considerable dimensions rising more or less abruptly, forming a conspicuous figure in the landscape, usually having a small extent of surface at its summit.
Any small rodent of the genus Mus.
The front opening of a creature through which food is ingested.
To change place or posture; to go, in any manner, from one place or position to another.
A recorded sequence of images displayed on a screen at a rate sufficiently fast to create the appearance of motion; a film.
A building or institution dedicated to the acquisition, conservation, study, exhibition, and educational interpretation of objects having scientific, historical, cultural or artistic value.
A series of sounds organized in time, usually employing some combination of harmony, melody, rhythm, tempo, etc., often to convey a mood.

To do as a requirement; indicates that the sentence subject is required as an imperative or directive to execute the sentence predicate, with failure to do so resulting in a failure or negative consequence.
Any nounal word or phrase which indicates a particular person, place, class, or thing.
Any of several types of true yam (Dioscorea) used in Caribbean Spanish cooking.
To give a name to.
Existing in nature.
Physically close.
At or towards a position close in space or time.
To have an absolute requirement for.
Not positive or neutral.
The residential area near one's home.
At no time; on no occasion; in no circumstance.
Recently made, or created.
New information of interest.

A publication, usually published daily or weekly, containing news and other articles. Traditionally a print publication typically printed on cheap, low-quality paper; today usually digital and often also available in print.
Nearest in place or position, having nothing similar intervening; adjoining.
In a time, place, rank or sequence closest or following.
Pleasant, satisfactory.
The time when the Sun is below the horizon when the sky is dark.
Of or pertaining to the north; northern.
Toward the north; northward; northerly.

The direction towards the pole to the left-hand side of someone facing east, specifically 0°, or (on another celestial object) the direction towards the pole lying on the northern side of the invariable plane.
A protuberance on the face housing the nostrils, which are used to breathe or smell.
Negates the meaning of the modified verb.
A symbol or annotation.
At the present time.
Quantity.

A thing that has physical existence but is not alive.

Frequently; many times on different occasions.
Of an object, concept, relationship, etc., having existed for a relatively long period of time.
To an operating state.
One and only one time.
A monocotyledonous plant (Allium cepa), allied to garlic, used as vegetable and spice.
Of a system: connected (generally electrically) to a larger network.
Alone in a category.
Without others or anything further; exclusively.
Physically unobstructed, uncovered, etc.
To make or become physically unobstructed, uncovered, etc.
A belief, judgment or perspective that a person has formed, either through objective or subjective reasoning, about a topic, issue, person or thing.
Located directly across from something else, or from each other.
In an opposite position.
Something opposite or contrary to something else.
Having the colour of the fruit of an orange tree; yellowred; reddish-yellow.
An evergreen tree of the genus Citrus such as Citrus sinensis which yields oranges (the fruit).
Arrangement, disposition, or sequence.
To set in some sort of order.
Away from the inside or centre.
To or in the outdoors or outside; to or in an area that is beyond the scope, limits, or borders of a given place.
Describing a physical change of position or state.

Belonging to; possessed; acquired; proper to; property of; titled to; held in one's name; under/using the name of. Often marks a possessive determiner as reflexive, referring back to the subject of the clause or sentence.
A serving boy; a youth attending a person of high degree, especially at courts, often as a position of honor and education.
One of the many pieces of paper bound together within a book or similar document.
A substance that is applied as a liquid or paste, and dries into a solid coating that protects or adds colour to an object or surface to which it has been applied.
To apply paint to.
An illustration or artwork done with the use of paint.
Two similar or identical things taken together; often followed by of.
An outer garment that covers the body from the waist downwards, covering each leg separately, usually as far as the ankles; trousers.
A sheet material typically used for writing on or printing on (or as a non-waterproof container), usually made by draining cellulose fibres from a suspension in water.
A passage in text that starts on a new line, the first line sometimes being indented, and usually marks a change of topic.
A person who raises a child (which they have made, adopted, fostered, taken as their own, etc.).
An area of land set aside for environment preservation or recreation.
To bring (something such as a vehicle) to a halt or store in a specified place.
A portion; a component.
Either of a pair of people or things that belong together.
A person or group of people constituting one side in a legal proceeding, such as in a legal action or a contract.
An official document normally used for international journeys, which proves the identity and nationality of the person for whom it was issued.
Having already happened; in the past; finished.
The period of time that has already happened, in contrast to the present and the future.
To cover (the bottom of a vessel, a seam, a spar, etc.) with tar or pitch, or a waterproof composition of tallow, resin, etc.; to smear.
To give money or other compensation to in exchange for goods or services.
A female swan.
A tool, originally made from a feather but now usually a small tubular instrument, containing ink used to write or make marks.
An enclosure (enclosed area) used to contain domesticated animals, especially sheep or cattle.
A paintbrush.
plural of person: a body of persons considered generally or collectively; a group of two or more persons.

Fitting its definition precisely.
A length of time.
An individual who has been granted personhood; usually a human being.
Pertaining to persons (human beings as opposed to things or animals).
A speech segment that possesses distinct physical or perceptual properties, considered as a physical event without regard to its place in the phonology of a language.
To call (someone) using a telephone.
A picture created by projecting an image onto a photosensitive surface such as a chemically treated plate or film, CCD receptor, etc.
A short written or spoken expression.
A percussive keyboard musical instrument, usually ranging over seven octaves, with white and black colored keys, played by pressing these keys, causing hammers to strike strings.
A representation of anything (as a person, a landscape, a building) upon canvas, paper, or other surface, by drawing, painting, printing, photography, etc.
A part of a larger whole, usually in such a form that it is able to be separated from other parts.
Any of several mammalian species of the genus Sus or the family Suidae, having cloven hooves, bristles and a snout adapted for digging; especially the domesticated animal Sus domesticus.
Having a colour between red and white; pale red.
A color reminiscent of pinks, the flowers.

Each of a series of men stationed at specific places along a postroad, with responsibility for relaying letters and dispatches of the monarch (and later others) along the route.

Repetition of an activity to improve a skill.

To make ready for a specific future purpose; to set up; to assemble or equip; to forearm.
Relating to now, for the time being; current.
The current moment or period of time.

Somewhat, fairly, quite; sometimes also (by meiosis) very.

In all likelihood.

Anything that is produced; a result.

Of a purple hue.

To do or say again (and again).

A piece of information describing, or an account of certain events given or presented to someone, with the most common adpositions being by (referring to creator of the report) and on (referring to the subject).
An eating establishment in which diners are served food, usually by waiters at their tables but sometimes (as in a fast food restaurant) at a counter.
That which results; the conclusion or end to which any course or condition of things leads, or which is obtained by any process or operation; consequence or effect.

Cereal plants, Oryza sativa of the grass family whose seeds are used as food.
Wealthy: having a lot of money and possessions.
To transport oneself by sitting on and directing a horse, later also a bicycle etc.
Designating the side of the body which is positioned to the east if one is facing north, the side on which the heart is not located in most humans. This arrow points to the reader's right: →
On the right side.
That which complies with justice, law or reason.
A large and often winding stream which drains a land mass, carrying water down from higher areas to a lower point, oftentimes ending in another body of water, such as an ocean or in an inland sea.

A way used for travelling between places, originally one wide enough to allow foot passengers and horses to travel, now (US) usually one surfaced with asphalt or concrete and designed to accommodate many vehicles travelling in both directions. In the UK both senses are heard: a country road is the same as a country lane.
An opportunity or scope (to do something).
A course of action to be followed regularly; a standard procedure.
A regulation, law, guideline.
To move swiftly.
Emotionally negative.
A food made primarily of a mixture of raw or cold ingredients, typically vegetables, usually served with a dressing such as vinegar or mayonnaise.
A common substance, chemically consisting mainly of sodium chloride (NaCl), used extensively as a condiment and preservative.
Not different or other; not another or others; not different as regards self; selfsame; identical.
The same way; in the same manner; to the same extent, equally.
A dish or foodstuff where at least one piece, but typically two or more pieces, of bread serves as the wrapper or container of some other food.
To pronounce.
A group of fish or a group of marine mammals such as porpoises, dolphins, or whales.
An institution dedicated to teaching and learning; an educational institution.
A particular discipline or branch of knowledge that is natural, measurable or consisting of systematic principles rather than intuition or technical skill.

One whose activities make use of the scientific method to answer questions regarding the measurable universe. A scientist may be involved in original research, or make use of the results of the research of others.
Number-two; following after the first one with nothing between them. The ordinal number corresponding to the cardinal number two.

A unit of time historically and commonly defined as a sixtieth of a minute which the International System of Units more precisely defines as the duration of 9,192,631,770 periods of radiation corresponding to the transition between two hyperfine levels of caesium-133 in a ground state at a temperature of absolute zero and at rest.
One who supports another in a contest or combat, such as a dueller's assistant.
Something that is number two in a series.
A cutting; a part cut out from the rest of something.
To perceive or detect someone or something with the eyes, or as if by sight.
To transfer goods or provide services in exchange for money.
To make something (such as an object or message) go from one place to another (or to someone).
The decision or judgement of a jury or court; a verdict.
To give part of what one has to somebody else to use or consume.
A woolly ruminant of the genus Ovis.
An article of clothing that is worn on the upper part of the body, and often has sleeves, either long or short, that cover the arms.

A protective covering for the foot, with a bottom part composed of thick leather or plastic sole and often a thicker heel, and a softer upper part made of leather or synthetic material. Shoes generally do not extend above the ankle, as opposed to boots, which do.
An establishment that sells goods or services to the public; originally only a physical location, but now a virtual establishment as well.
To visit stores or shops to browse or explore merchandise, especially with the intention of buying such merchandise.
The process of buying goods or services, or searching for those suitable to buy.
Having a small distance from one end or edge to another, either horizontally or vertically.
Ought to; indicating opinion, advice, or instruction, about what is required or desirable.
A play, dance, or other entertainment.
To display, to have somebody see (something).
A brief fall of precipitation (spell of rain, or a similar fall of snow, sleet, or cascade); burst of hefty precipitation.

In poor health; ill.
Having traits or characteristics in common; alike, allied, comparable.
To produce musical or harmonious sounds with one’s voice.
A person who sings, often professionally.
A person who, or device which, singes.
A daughter of the same parents as another person; a female sibling.
To be in a position in which the upper body is upright and supported by the buttocks.
The combination of circumstances at a given moment; a state of affairs.
A capacity to do something well; a technique, an ability, usually acquired or learned, as opposed to abilities that are regarded as innate.
An article of clothing, usually worn by women and girls, that hangs from the waist and covers the lower part of the body.
To rest in a state of reduced consciousness.
Taking a long time to move or go a short distance, or to perform an action; not quick in motion; proceeding at a low speed.
Not large or big; insignificant; few in number.
Exhibiting social ability or cleverness.
Any of the suborder Serpentes of legless reptile with long, thin bodies and fork-shaped tongues.
A square-rigged sailing vessel similar to a brig formerly used as a warship, with a foremast, a mainmast, and a trysail mast immediately abaft (behind) the mainmast.

The partly frozen, crystalline state of water that falls from the atmosphere as precipitation in flakes; also, the falling of such flakes; and the accumulation of them on the ground or on objects as a white layer.
Preceded by the dummy subject it: to have snow (noun sense 1) fall from the atmosphere.
To the (explicitly stated) extent.
On some occasions, over some periods, or in certain circumstances, but not always.
One's male offspring.
A musical composition with lyrics for voice or voices, performed by singing.
Immediately, instantly.
Regretful or apologetic for one's actions.
A long narrow inlet, or a strait between the mainland and an island; also, a strait connecting two seas, or connecting a sea or lake with the ocean.
A long, thin probe for sounding or dilating body cavities or canals such as the urethra; a sonde.
A sensation perceived by the ear caused by the vibration of air or some other medium.
Of a whale, to dive downwards.
To produce a sound.
Any of various dishes commonly made by combining liquids, such as water or stock, with other ingredients, such as meat and vegetables, that contribute the food value, flavor, and texture.
Toward the south; southward.
Toward the south; southward.

The direction towards the pole to the right-hand side of someone facing east, specifically 180°, or (on another celestial object) the direction towards the pole lying on the southern side of the invariable plane.
Unlimited or generalized extent, physical or otherwise.

Distinguished by a unique, particular, or unusual quality.
To put under the influence of a spell; to affect by a spell; to bewitch; to fascinate; to charm.
To work in place of (someone).
To write or say the letters that form a word or part of a word.
The act, practice, ability, or subject of forming words with letters, or of reading the letters of words; orthography.
To pay out (money).
Any activity that uses physical exertion or skills competitively under a set of rules that is not based on aesthetics.
An act of springing: a leap, a jump.

Any small, natural and bright dot appearing in the unobscured sky, especially in the night or twilight sky.
To begin, commence, initiate.
A declaration or remark.
A stopping place.
To remain in a particular place, especially for a definite or short period of time; sojourn; abide.
Without motion.
A (usually marked) place where buses, trams or trains halt to let passengers get on and off, usually smaller than a station.

A place where items may be accumulated or routinely kept.
An account of real or fictional events.

Capable of producing great physical force.
A person who studies or learns about a particular subject.
Mental effort to acquire knowledge or learning.
To review materials already learned in order to make sure one does not forget them, usually in preparation for an examination.

The noun, pronoun or noun phrase about whom the statement is made. In active clauses with verbs denoting an action, the subject is the actor. In clauses in the passive voice the subject is the target of the action.
The achievement of one's aim or goal.
Sucrose in the form of small crystals, obtained from sugar cane or sugar beet and used to sweeten food and drink.
A horizontal beam supporting a building.

One of four seasons, traditionally the second, marked by the longest and typically hottest days of the year due to the inclination of the Earth and thermal lag. Typically regarded as spanning the months of June, July, and August in the Northern Hemisphere and the months of December, January and February in the Southern Hemisphere.
A star, especially when seen as the centre of any single solar system.
A large self-service store that sells groceries and, usually, medications, household goods, and/or clothing.
Physically secure and certain, non-failing, reliable.
A knitted jacket or jersey, usually of thick wool, worn by athletes before or after exercise.
To move through the water, without touching the bottom; to propel oneself in water by natural means.
The act or art of sustaining and propelling the body in water.
The state of being dizzy or in vertigo.
Furniture with a top surface to accommodate a variety of uses.
To get into one's hands, possession, or control, with or without force.
To communicate, usually by means of speech.
Having a vertical extent greater than the average. For example, somebody with a height of over 6 feet would generally be considered to be tall.
A vehicle that may be hired for single journeys by members of the public, particularly one with an automated meter to calculate the fare.
The tea plant (Camellia sinensis); (countable) a variety of this plant.
To pass on knowledge to.
A person who teaches, especially one employed in a school; preceptor.
A set of draught animals, such as two horses in front of a carriage.
A person between 13 and 19 years old.
A telecommunication device (originally mechanical, and now electronic) used for two-way talking with another person (now often shortened to phone).

An electronic communication medium that allows the transmission of real-time visual images, and often sound.
To count, reckon, or enumerate.
A sport played by two players (or four in doubles), who alternately strike the ball over a net using racquets.

The name of a film, musical piece, painting, or other work of art.

At the same time, in the same place; in close association or proximity.
A room, enclosed area or single-purpose building containing a fixture or fixtures used for urination and defecation; a bathroom or water closet.
A widely cultivated plant, Solanum lycopersicum, having edible fruit.
On the day after the present day.
The day after the present day.
During the night following the current day; during the evening of today.
The nighttime of the current day or date; this night.
Likewise.
A hard, calcareous structure present in the mouth of many vertebrate animals, generally used for biting and chewing food.
Subject; theme; a category or general area of interest.
Someone who travels for pleasure rather than for business.

A settlement; an area with residential districts, shops and amenities, and its own local government; especially one larger than a village and smaller than a city, historically enclosed by a fence or walls, with total populations ranging from several hundred to more than a hundred thousand (as of the early 21st century)
Moving pedestrians or vehicles, or the flux or passage thereof.
Elongated or trailing portion.
The act of traveling; passage from place to place.
To be on a journey, often for pleasure or business and with luggage; to go from one place to another.
A perennial woody plant taller and larger than a shrub with a wooden trunk and, at some distance from the ground, having leaves and branches.
A journey; an excursion or jaunt.
A small wheel or roller, specifically the wheel of a gun carriage.
Conforming to the actual state of reality or fact; factually correct.

In or to a lower or subordinate position, or a position beneath or below something, physically or figuratively.
(of communication or means of communication: words, statements, signs, etc.) To know the meaning of; to parse or have parsed correctly; to comprehend.

Institution of higher education (typically accepting students from the age of about 17 or 18, depending on country, but in some exceptional cases able to take younger students) where subjects are studied and researched in depth and degrees are offered.
Indicating movement towards or location at a higher place or position.
Up the stairs; on or to a higher floor or level.
To utilize or employ.
Having a practical or beneficial use.
Most of the time; less than always, but more than occasionally.
Freedom from some business or activity.
Any plant.

Television, a television show, or a movie.

To habitually go to (someone in distress, sickness etc.) to comfort them. (Now generally merged into later senses, below.)

To move on the feet by alternately setting each foot (or pair or group of feet, in the case of animals with four or more feet) forward, with at least one foot on the ground at all times. Compare run.
A rampart of earth, stones etc. built up for defensive purposes.
To wish for or desire (something); to feel a need or desire for; to crave, hanker, or demand.
Of a somewhat high temperature, often but not always connoting that the high temperature is pleasant rather than uncomfortable.
To clean with water.
A portable or wearable timepiece.
To look at, see, or view for a period of time.

A inorganic compound (of molecular formula H₂O) found at room temperature and pressure as a clear liquid; it is present naturally as rain, and found in rivers, lakes and seas; its solid form is ice and its gaseous form is steam.
To do with a place or places.

The short term state of the atmosphere at a specific time and place, including the temperature, relative humidity, cloud cover, precipitation, wind, etc.
A collection of interlinked web pages on the World Wide Web that are typically accessible from the same base URL and reside on the same server.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
The break in the working week, usually two days including the traditional holy or sabbath day. Thus in western countries, Saturday and Sunday.
Whose arrival is a cause of joy; received with gladness; admitted willingly to the house, entertainment, or company.
To affirm or greet the arrival of someone, especially by saying "Welcome!".

Accurately, competently, satisfactorily.
Situated or lying in or toward the west; westward.

The direction opposite to that of the earth's rotation, specifically 270°.
At what time? At which time? Upon which occasion or circumstance? Used to introduce direct or indirect questions about time.
In, at or to what place.
Bright and colourless; reflecting equal quantities of all frequencies of visible light.
The color of snow or milk; the color of light containing equal amounts of all visible wavelengths.
For what cause, reason, or purpose.
A married woman, especially in relation to her spouse.
To instruct (that something be done) in one's will.
Used to express the future tense, sometimes with an implication of volition or determination when used in the first person. Compare shall.
To conquer, defeat.
An opening, usually covered by one or more panes of clear glass, to allow light and air from outside to enter a building or vehicle.
An alcoholic beverage made by fermenting grape juice, with an ABV ranging from 5.5–16%.

Traditionally the fourth of the four seasons, typically regarded as spanning the months of December, January, and February in temperate and polar regions of the Northern Hemisphere or the months of June, July, and August in the Southern Hemisphere. It is the time when the sun is lowest in the sky, resulting in short days, and the time of year with the lowest atmospheric temperatures for the region.
An adult female human.
Tending to excite wonder; surprising, extraordinary.
The smallest unit of language that has a particular meaning and can be expressed by itself; the smallest discrete, meaningful unit of language. (contrast morpheme.)
Employment.
To do a specific task by employing physical or mental powers.
One who works: a person who performs labor for a living; traditionally, especially, manual labor.
The subjective human experience, regarded collectively; human collective existence; existence in general; the reality we live in.
Past tense of will; usually followed by a bare infinitive.
To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
A person who writes, or produces literary work; an author can refer to themselves as "the writer".
Graphism of symbols such as letters that express some meaning.
Incorrect or untrue.
A small, usually uncultivated area adjoining or (now especially) within the precincts of a house or other building.
A unit of length equal to 3 feet in the US customary and British imperial systems of measurement, equal to precisely 0.9144 m since 1959 (US) or 1963 (UK).
A period of time akin to the time taken for the Earth to undergo a full cycle of seasons.
Of a yellow hue.

The color of sunflower petals and lemons; the color obtained by mixing green and red light, or by subtracting blue from white light; the color evoked by light of wavelength around 580 nm; one of the three primary colors in subtractive color systems.
On the day before today.
The day immediately before today; one day ago.
In the early part of growth or life; born not long ago.
